_aChangeLog.text: Fixed a few Textures & models placement
Repacked Map Size down from 126 MB to 36 MB

_sText:
== CSGO Ported Map created by Hypilix ==
This port was made a while ago, just uploading for the sake of preserving map ports

This is a Jailbreak map with Harry Potter theme and "Christmas"
I hope you will enjoy this map.


== Full of games ==

- Extreme Climb (some areas kills)
- Race 1/2 (2 versions)
- Quidditch "Remastered"
- Spleef
- Bhop
- Moving Floor
- Hunger games
- Monopoly
- H.P Labyrinth / Harry Potter Labyrinth (there are traps that kill) = 2 Random Versions
You will have to find the exit avoiding the traps! Attention in one of the versions there is a button activated to open the way towards the continuation of the Labyrinth!

== Basement ==
- 1vs1 Magic Cut
You are on "the arena of magic" and you will each be boosted from one side to the other. TERO vs TERO available via Mp_friendlyfire

- Magic Broom Racing (magic broom race)
This game is as you drove / directed the Nimbus, it will find the exit (no indication but it is logical to understand), it will go into the corners of the "Labyrinth" and take the Nimbus to open the way !

== Features ==
Armory with weapons: Desert Eagle, P250, Awp, Ak47, Nova, Sg556, M4a1-s, and M4a4
2 Secrets Nimbus gravity and speed
3 Infirmary

Jails with four houses: Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Slytherin and Ravenclaw

Full of secrets, leads, weapons, etc. To you all to find;)

Subscribe, note and share with your friends my map! Thank you !
